Our Classroom Material Distribution Services

Welcome to our classroom material distribution system! Below are the services we offer:

Material Request

Students can request materials from available resources. Simply select the material and submit your request.

Material Upload

Teachers can upload educational materials to be shared with students.

Material Management

Admins can manage materials and requests, including approving and rejecting them.

Download Materials

Approved requests can download the materials directly from the platform.
